sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.RequestConferenceParticipantSNC</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Implements extension point global.ConferenceParticipants for the Request related tables</description> <name>RequestConferenceParticipantSNC</name> <script><![CDATA[var RequestConferenceParticipantSNC = Class.create(); RequestConferenceParticipantSNC.prototype = { initialize: function() {}, ITIL_ROLE: "itil", CONF_LEADER_RESTRICTED_ACCESS_PROP: "com.snc.notify.conference_leader_restricted_access", CATALOG_REQUEST_ITEM_TABLE: "sc_req_item", CATALOG_REQUEST_TABLE: "sc_request", CATALOG_TASK_TABLE: "sc_task", /** * @param {InputData} inputData * @param {ParticipantData} previousContacts * @param {String} type - NotifyUtil.numberType.sms | NotifyUtil.numberType.voice * @returns {ParticipantData} */ getContacts: function(inputData, previousContacts, type) { return []; },
/** * @param {string} groupId * @param {InputData} inputData * @param {ParticipantData} groupData * @param {String} type - NotifyUtil.numberType.sms | NotifyUtil.numberType.voice * @returns {ParticipantData} */ getGroupDetails: function(groupId, inputData, /* Optional */ alreadyGotGroupDetails, type) {}, /** * @param {GlideRecord} sourceGr * @param {string} userId */ isConferenceLeader: function(sourceGr, /* Optional */ userId) { var isConferenceLeaderAccessRestricted = GlideProperties.getBoolean(this.CONF_LEADER_RESTRICTED_ACCESS_PROP, true); if (isConferenceLeaderAccessRestricted && sourceGr.isValidRecord() && (sourceGr.instanceOf(this.CATALOG_REQUEST_ITEM_TABLE) || sourceGr.instanceOf(this.CATALOG_REQUEST_TABLE) || sourceGr.instanceOf(this.CATALOG_TASK_TABLE))) { if ((!userId && gs.hasRole(this.ITIL_ROLE)) || GlideUser.getUserByID(userId).hasRole(this.ITIL_ROLE)) return true; return false; } return; }, /** * The extension point implementations are invoked in no specific order, the first one to respond * its response will be taken. If no implementations return then default notify for task number will * will be used. * @param {GlideRecord} sourceGr * @returns (string} undefined / a valid Notify number as string */ getNotifyNumber: function(sourceGr) {}, /** * @param {string} actionName * @param {GlideRecord} sourceGr * @param {string} userId */ isActionAllowed: function(actionName, sourceGr, /* Optional */ userId) {}, type: 'RequestConferenceParticipantSNC' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-22 13:21:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1aafa09847472110112ad922736d4366</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>RequestConferenceParticipantSNC</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">c600d3a193a00210b31a30dcebba10e1</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1aafa09847472110112ad922736d4366</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-06-16 08:33:03</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
